transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string,
		Column_13 as string,
		Column_14 as string,
		Column_15 as string,
		Column_16 as string,
		Column_17 as string,
		Column_18 as string,
		Column_19 as string,
		Column_20 as string,
		Column_21 as string,
		Column_22 as string,
		Column_23 as string,
		Column_24 as string,
		Column_25 as string,
		Column_26 as string,
		Column_27 as string,
		Column_28 as string,
		Column_29 as string,
		Column_30 as string,
		Column_31 as string,
		Column_32 as string,
		Column_33 as string,
		Column_34 as string,
		Column_35 as string,
		Column_36 as string,
		Column_37 as string,
		Column_38 as string,
		Column_39 as string,
		Column_40 as string,
		Column_41 as string,
		Column_42 as string,
		Column_43 as string,
		Column_44 as string,
		Column_45 as string,
		Column_46 as string,
		Column_47 as string,
		Column_48 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CustomerXML
source(output(
		SK_BrokerID as integer,
		BrokerID as integer,
		ManagerID as integer,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		MiddleInitial as string,
		Branch as string,
		Office as string,
		Phone as string,
		IsCurrent as boolean,
		BatchID as integer,
		EffectiveDate as date,
		EndDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimBroker
source(output(
		SK_CustomerID as integer,
		CustomerID as integer,
		TaxID as string,
		Status as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleInitial as string,
		Gender as string,
		Tier as integer,
		DOB as date,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		City as string,
		StateProv as string,
		Country as string,
		Phone1 as string,
		Phone2 as string,
		Phone3 as string,
		Email1 as string,
		Email2 as string,
		NationalTaxRateDesc as string,
		NationalTaxRate as decimal(6,5),
		LocalTaxRateDesc as string,
		LocalTaxRate as decimal(6,5),
		AgencyID as string,
		CreditRating as integer,
		NetWorth as decimal(10,0),
		MarketingNameplate as string,
		IsCurrent as boolean,
		BatchID as integer,
		EffectiveDate as date,
		EndDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> CustomerTable
CustomerXML derive({TPCDI:Actions} = toString(byName('TPCDI:Actions')),
		{xmlns:TPCDI} = toString(byName('xmlns:TPCDI')),
		{TPCDI:Action} = toString(byName('TPCDI:Action')),
		ActionType = toString(byName('ActionType')),
		ActionTS = toString(byName('ActionTS')),
		Customer = toString(byName('Customer')),
		C_ID = toString(byName('C_ID')),
		C_TAX_ID = toString(byName('C_TAX_ID')),
		C_GNDR = toString(byName('C_GNDR')),
		C_TIER = toString(byName('C_TIER')),
		C_DOB = toString(byName('C_DOB')),
		Name = toString(byName('Name')),
		C_L_NAME = toString(byName('C_L_NAME')),
		C_F_NAME = toString(byName('C_F_NAME')),
		C_M_NAME = toString(byName('C_M_NAME')),
		Address = toString(byName('Address')),
		C_ADLINE1 = toString(byName('C_ADLINE1')),
		C_ADLINE2 = toString(byName('C_ADLINE2')),
		C_ZIPCODE = toString(byName('C_ZIPCODE')),
		C_CITY = toString(byName('C_CITY')),
		C_STATE_PROV = toString(byName('C_STATE_PROV')),
		C_CTRY = toString(byName('C_CTRY')),
		ContactInfo = toString(byName('ContactInfo')),
		C_PRIM_EMAIL = toString(byName('C_PRIM_EMAIL')),
		C_ALT_EMAIL = toString(byName('C_ALT_EMAIL')),
		C_PHONE_1 = toString(byName('C_PHONE_1')),
		C_CTRY_CODE26 = toString(byName('C_CTRY_CODE26')),
		C_AREA_CODE27 = toString(byName('C_AREA_CODE27')),
		C_LOCAL28 = toString(byName('C_LOCAL28')),
		C_EXT29 = toString(byName('C_EXT29')),
		C_PHONE_2 = toString(byName('C_PHONE_2')),
		C_CTRY_CODE31 = toString(byName('C_CTRY_CODE31')),
		C_AREA_CODE32 = toString(byName('C_AREA_CODE32')),
		C_LOCAL33 = toString(byName('C_LOCAL33')),
		C_EXT34 = toString(byName('C_EXT34')),
		C_PHONE_3 = toString(byName('C_PHONE_3')),
		C_CTRY_CODE36 = toString(byName('C_CTRY_CODE36')),
		C_AREA_CODE37 = toString(byName('C_AREA_CODE37')),
		C_LOCAL38 = toString(byName('C_LOCAL38')),
		C_EXT39 = toString(byName('C_EXT39')),
		TaxInfo = toString(byName('TaxInfo')),
		C_LCL_TX_ID = toString(byName('C_LCL_TX_ID')),
		C_NAT_TX_ID = toString(byName('C_NAT_TX_ID')),
		Account = toString(byName('Account')),
		CA_ID = toString(byName('CA_ID')),
		CA_TAX_ST = toString(byName('CA_TAX_ST')),
		CA_B_ID = toString(byName('CA_B_ID')),
		CA_NAME = toString(byName('CA_NAME'))) ~> MapDrifted1
MapDrifted1 select(mapColumn(
		ActionType,
		ActionTS,
		C_ID,
		AccountID = CA_ID,
		TaxStatus = CA_TAX_ST,
		CA_B_ID,
		AccountDesc = CA_NAME
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveColumns1
RemoveColumns1 derive(Status = iif(ActionType=='CLOSEACCT'||ActionType=='INACT', 'INACTIVE', 'ACTIVE'),
		EffectiveDate = toDate(substring(toString(ActionTS),1,10), 'yyyy-MM-dd'),
		EndDate = toDate('9999-12-31','yyyy-MM-dd')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 derive(isCurrent = iif( EndDate== toDate('99991231','yyyyMMdd'), true(), false()),
		BatchID = 1) ~> DerivedColumn2
DimBroker select(mapColumn(
		BrokerID,
		SK_BrokerID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
CustomerTable select(mapColumn(
		SK_CustomerID,
		CustomerID,
		IsCurrent,
		EffectiveDate,
		EndDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> customer
DerivedColumn2 sink(input(
		{TPCDI:Actions} as string,
		{xmlns:TPCDI} as string,
		{TPCDI:Action} as string,
		ActionType as string,
		ActionTS as string,
		Customer as string,
		C_ID as string,
		C_TAX_ID as string,
		C_GNDR as string,
		C_TIER as string,
		C_DOB as string,
		Name as string,
		C_L_NAME as string,
		C_F_NAME as string,
		C_M_NAME as string,
		Address as string,
		C_ADLINE1 as string,
		C_ADLINE2 as string,
		C_ZIPCODE as string,
		C_CITY as string,
		C_STATE_PROV as string,
		C_CTRY as string,
		ContactInfo as string,
		C_PRIM_EMAIL as string,
		C_ALT_EMAIL as string,
		C_PHONE_1 as string,
		C_CTRY_CODE26 as string,
		C_AREA_CODE27 as string,
		C_LOCAL28 as string,
		C_EXT29 as string,
		C_PHONE_2 as string,
		C_CTRY_CODE31 as string,
		C_AREA_CODE32 as string,
		C_LOCAL33 as string,
		C_EXT34 as string,
		C_PHONE_3 as string,
		C_CTRY_CODE36 as string,
		C_AREA_CODE37 as string,
		C_LOCAL38 as string,
		C_EXT39 as string,
		TaxInfo as string,
		C_LCL_TX_ID as string,
		C_NAT_TX_ID as string,
		Account as string,
		CA_ID as string,
		CA_TAX_ST as string,
		CA_B_ID as string,
		CA_NAME as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['AccountRaw'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
